title: AI Vision System Bias Alert at Local School
context: A mistaken weapon alert led to student detainment. System logs show detection bias.

steps.prompt: How do you address the parents and school leadership after the incident?
feedback: Good approach — acknowledge harm and propose data review.
Include more details on root cause accountability.

steps.prompt: City officials ask what immediate containment steps are required.
feedback: Yes — disable alert zone causing false positives.
Also mention real-time audit logging for the next 30 days.

steps.prompt: What long-term governance changes do you propose?
feedback: Great — integrate bias testing + retraining cycles.
Include diverse stakeholder review boards in the pipeline.
